summary: Modifies two conjuration sounds for the player and all NPCs. Currently \'cast\' and \'portal\' are changed. A link to LISTEN and compare is in the description. You will definitely notice this when an NPC summons a creature. I think you will like it after you hear it a few times.
descriptionHtml:
[u]V\'s Conjuration Sounds[/u]

[size=1]by Bethesda, and VirusType2 - AKA Vergis, January 1, 2012.[/size]


Modifies two conjuration sounds for the player and all NPCs. \'Cast\' and \'portal\' are changed. 

[url=http://soundcloud.com/virustype2/vs-conjure-summon-compare]LIisten and Compare (vanilla plays first, followed by the new sound)[/url]

I thought vanilla sound is wimpy, harsh, loud, too short, and uninteresting. So I made quite a few tweaks. No offense to the sound designer - as a hobbyist sound effects engineer and musician - he\'s my hero. 


I absolutely love it when I fight conjurers! You will definitely notice this, and I hope you will like. 


I used the bit rate and sample format Bethesda chose, so you don\'t have to worry about any issues. It actually is synced to the portal better than vanilla. 


News:

John Kelly has put up a mod that changes the same two sounds. 

Improved Conjuration Sounds by John Kelly: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6625

While I think my version is much better, you might prefer his version. Thanks for checking this out.



INSTALL:
Merge the Data folder with Skyrim\'s Data folder

UNINSTALLATION:
To remove this mod, simply delete:

mag_conjure_fire.wav
mag_conjure_portal.wav

The files are located here: skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\mag\\conjure


Thanks to:

Bethesda
BSAopt
Audacity
7zip

and of course, Skyrimnexus.com
